text: Panch Pargana Kisan College, also known as P.P.K. College, established in 1978, is a general degree college in Bundu, Jharkhand. It offers undergraduate courses in arts, commerce and sciences. It is affiliated to Ranchi University. ==Accreditation== B.N.J. College was accrediated by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC). ==References== ==Other websites== *http://ppkcollegebundu.in/ Category:1978 establishments in Asia Category:Colleges and universities in India Category:1970s establishments in India
title: Panch Pargana Kisan College
